content: the eyelets for the sample i repeated row 11-32 three times because i didn t have enough yarn to do another full repeat of row 11-32 and i wanted to use up all my remaining yarn i just kept knitting the garter stitch pattern and knit 20 row instead of 10 copyright © 2015 emerald lotus fiberarts this pattern is offered free for personal use only and is not to be sold please contact us if you have any questions or problems with the pattern elfiberarts@gmail com
